translation: wyżej wymieniony [the person or people mentioned earlier]
sentence: The aforementioned Mr Parkes then entered the cinema.

translation: pan młody [a man who is about to get married or has just got married]
sentence: The bridegroom was late for the ceremony.

translation: uszczelniać [to fill the gaps around the edge of something, for example a bath or shower, with a special substance]
sentence: Calk all cracks between the trim and siding or masonry.

translation: zbezcześcić [to spoil something or someone so that that thing or person is less beautiful or pure]
sentence: It's a shame that such a beautiful area has been defiled by a rubbish dump.

translation: trzeć, ucierać [to rub food against a grater in order to cut it into a lot of small pieces]
sentence: Grate the cheese and sprinkle it over the tomatoes.
He gave an incendiary speech at last night’s rally.
Cases of infanticide often involve extreme emotional disturbance.

translation: półka nad kominkiem [a shelf above a fireplace, usually part of a frame that surrounds the fireplace]
sentence: She has photographs of all her grandchildren on the mantelpiece.

translation: skubać [to eat something by taking a lot of small bites]
sentence: A mouse has nibbled through the computer cables.
By ten o'clock I was feeling peckish, even though I'd had a large breakfast.

translation: być powszechnym, dominować [to get control or influence; to be common among a group of people or area at a particular time]
sentence: This attitude still prevails among the middle classes.

translation: reżim, dieta [any set of rules about food and exercise that someone follows, especially in order to improve their health]
sentence: After his heart attack the doctor put him on a strict regimen.

translation: beznamiętny, powściągliwy [(of a person) calm and not showing emotion or excitement]
zestawienie (lub: wynik, rezultat) [a record or count of a number of things]
sentence: Keep a tally of how much you spend while you're away.
Trachea is the tube that carries air from your throat to your lungs.
